name: Don't Get Carved
description:
It's Halloween and you would make a perfect Jack-O-Lantern. Don't Get Carved!

I started this project on October 30, 2022 so please excuse any bugs while I iron out the kinks.

INSTRUCTIONS

Left-click to move

Collect coins for points

100 coins = +1 Health

Red lines on the ground show where an axe will swing

Don't Get Carved

CHANGELOG

v0.0.1

  • Added options menu
  • Added "Spectator Only Mode" toggle in options menu
  • Added "Room ID" input field in options menu
  • Added "Room ID" display to game screen
  • Added Spectator Only Mode
  • Added environmental props to game scene
  • Added bonus coins when other pumpkins get carved
  • Added bonus coins based on health remaining for winner
  • Fixed issue with game page having extra UI elements

v0.0.0

  • Initial Upload
